credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: Add your API credentials to authenticate Shopify with your Bloomreach Account.

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Select the endpoints for each Bloomreach feature.

pixel.title: Pixel
pixel.description: Turn on the Bloomreach Pixel on your site to enable our AI optimization engine.

MulitCurrency.title: Multi-currency
MulitCurrency.description: Turn on the multi-currency support within Bloomreach templates.

sync.title: Sync Themes
sync.description: Re-install Bloomreach on all your themes.

version.title: Version Info
version.description: This shows the app version and SDK version it's using.

catalogs.title: Bloomreach Catalogs
catalogs.description: Configure Shopify markets to Bloomreach catalogs mappings.

views.title: Bloomreach Views
views.description: Configure Shopify countries to Bloomreach views mappings.

themes.title: Working Theme
themes.description: The working theme will be used by the app when adding Bloomreach Embed Block and App Blocks. You can also add them to any themes in Shopify Theme Editor.
